Component.Name: APIService
Component.description: The API Service provides a way to interact with the Corkscrew system without creating hard dependencies with the Corkscrew SDK libraries. It provides most features of the SDK via a WCF web service. The application is a WCF web service that is installed into your system's IIS web server. It uses ASP.NET 4.5 and WCF technologies. The service will require connectivity to your Corkscrew_ConfigDB database to function.
